Yes, commit https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/301e3043e67493ce3777d2b36b43d0210f7b920c#diff-6d6d850ad586ab99cc0dbaabba8a229c disables auto sharding by default, and instead adds an argument to `MirroredStrategy` to explicitly turn it on.
